auth.joinOutfitr: Join OUTFITR to start styling your outfits
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

home.title: Welcome to
home.subtitle: OUTFITR, The Outfit Equation, AI-powered outfit styling assistant
home.getStartedDescription: Sign up now and start your smart styling journey
home.welcomeMessage: Ready to create your perfect outfit?

feature1.title: Manage Wardrobe
feature1.description: Easily add and manage your clothing items, build your personal wardrobe

feature2.title: AI Smart Styling
feature2.description: Use AI technology to generate personalized outfit recommendations

feature3.title: Fashion Recommendations
feature3.description: Get the best outfit suggestions based on season and style

wardrobe.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
